name: part_006
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら6周年記念LIVE】周年3D LIVE！ぺこらRUSH！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [E2D_YFRHFG8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Usada Pekora and Amane Kanata perform 'Toushi no Hana' (Flower of Fighting Spirit).
A special slot machine animation sequence leading to a 'Battle Bonus' feature, featuring a muscular Pekora and a Raoh-like antagonist.
Usada Pekora and Inugami Korone perform 'TOUGH BOY'.

subtitles.original: 狂い咲けよ 闘志の華よ
subtitles.english: Bloom wildly, flower of fighting spirit

subtitles.original: 戦の地に降り立つ夢
subtitles.english: A dream descending on the land of battle

subtitles.original: 大輪の炎 闇を撃ち散らして
subtitles.english: A great bloom of flame, scattering the darkness

subtitles.original: 勝利を 勇気と熱を楯に
subtitles.english: Victory, with courage and passion as your shield

subtitles.original: 掴め 辿り着く金色の空
subtitles.english: Grasp it, the golden sky you finally reach

subtitles.original: 笑顔を育む大地へ
subtitles.english: To the land that nurtures smiles

subtitles.original: 夜はいずれ去り 朝が訪れる
subtitles.english: The night will eventually pass, and morning will arrive

subtitles.original: 全てを越えて 君の愛 叶う
subtitles.english: Overcoming everything, your love will come true

subtitles.original: 星の巡りを辿り 手にした希望の十字
subtitles.english: Tracing the movement of stars, the cross of hope held in hand

subtitles.original: 後悔などしないわ 赦しは私が与える
subtitles.english: I will have no regrets, I am the one who grants forgiveness

subtitles.original: 発射仕掛けの恋 光が導きし舞
subtitles.english: A love of widespread artifice, a dance guided by light

subtitles.original: 大胆不敵な場所 奇跡生まれる楽園
subtitles.english: A fearless place, a paradise where miracles are born

subtitles.original: さあ 共に往きましょう
subtitles.english: Come, let us go together

subtitles.original: 正義は必ず勝つ いつでも
subtitles.english: Justice will always prevail, forever

subtitles.original: 空を渡る 溢れだし燃える想いが
subtitles.english: Crossing the sky, overflowing and burning feelings

subtitles.original: 鮮やかに彩る虹へ 瞳を交わして絆を
subtitles.english: Towards a vividly colored rainbow, exchanging glances and bonds

subtitles.original: 結べば 見えてくる新しい朝が
subtitles.english: If tied, a new morning will come into view

subtitles.original: 胸の中を 雨はやがて止み 癒すよ
subtitles.english: Inside the heart, the rain will eventually stop and heal you

subtitles.original: 過去を解き放ち 君の夢を問う
subtitles.english: Release the past, and ask of your dream

subtitles.original: 貴方と想いを 数えきれないほどの出会いと別れ 重ねて
subtitles.english: With you and my feelings, countless encounters and partings piling up

subtitles.original: 真実 人は生きる意味を見つける
subtitles.english: The truth, people find the meaning of life

subtitles.original: 狂い咲けよ 闘志の華よ
subtitles.english: Bloom wildly, flower of fighting spirit

subtitles.original: 戦の地に降り立つ夢
subtitles.english: A dream descending on the land of battle

subtitles.original: 大輪の炎 闇を撃ち散らして
subtitles.english: A great bloom of flame, scattering the darkness

subtitles.original: 勝利を 勇気と熱を楯に
subtitles.english: Victory, with courage and passion as your shield

subtitles.original: 辿り着く金色の空
subtitles.english: The golden sky you finally reach

subtitles.original: 笑顔を育む大地へ
subtitles.english: To the land that nurtures smiles

subtitles.original: 祝福が 朝は訪れる
subtitles.english: A blessing, morning will arrive

subtitles.original: 全てを越えて 君の愛 叶う
subtitles.english: Overcoming everything, your love will come true

subtitles.original: 待っていたぞ、ぺこら。
subtitles.english: I have been waiting for you, Pekora.

subtitles.original: 出てこい！
subtitles.english: Come out!

subtitles.original: ゲットー！
subtitles.english: Got it!

subtitles.original: Welcome to this crazy Time
subtitles.english: Welcome to this crazy Time

subtitles.original: このイカれた時代へようこそ君は
subtitles.english: Welcome to this crazy era, you are

subtitles.original: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy
subtitles.english: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy

subtitles.original: まともな奴ほど feel so bad
subtitles.english: The more sane you are, the more you feel so bad

subtitles.original: 正気でいられるなんて運がイイぜ you
subtitles.english: You're lucky to be able to stay sane

subtitles.original: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy
subtitles.english: tough boy tough boy tough boy tough boy

subtitles.original: 時はまさに世紀末
subtitles.english: The time is exactly the end of the century

subtitles.original: 淀んだ街角で僕らは出会った
subtitles.english: We met at a stagnant street corner

subtitles.original: Keep you burning 駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Keep you burning, run through

subtitles.original: この腐敗と自由と暴力のまっただなか
subtitles.english: In the midst of this decay, freedom, and violence

subtitles.original: No boy no cry 悲しみは
subtitles.english: No boy no cry, sadness is

subtitles.original: 絶望じゃなくて明日のマニフェスト
subtitles.english: Not despair, but the manifesto of tomorrow

subtitles.original: We are living, living in the eighties
subtitles.english: We are living, living in the eighties

subtitles.original: We still fight, fighting in the eighties
subtitles.english: We still fight, fighting in the eighties
